description.value: Character is a senior member of a relevent organisation within the Imperium, and often carries a symbol or icon to serve as proof of the Authority this gives. Gain +10 to Command and Intimidate Tests when dealing with any that understand and either respect or fear the Organisation in question if you identify yourself as the bearer of such authority.
